title.narrative: WASH INFO MGT SYSTEM

description.narrative: WASH Information Management System (WIMS) is functional between RSS, State and County levels and all stakeholders , bringing greater equity to the allocation of resources and a solid evidence base for priority setting., which contributes to Wash â€“ General, Water. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Improved, equitable and sustainable use of Water, Sanitation, and Hygiene (WASH) service and facilities Guinea Worm endemic areas, schools and health facilities as well as underserved communities.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: WASH Information Management System (WIMS) is functional between RSS, State and County levels and all stakeholders , bringinggreater equity to the allocation of resources and a solid evidence base for priority setting.
Issuance of MWRI directive on the staffing functions with clear roles and responsibilities for the WIMS team.
Number of Counties trained in WIMS formats and provided with Laptops
Number of WIMS State offices established and providing regular updates/report to WIMS
Number of maps, KMZs and quarterly reports shared by WIMS with sector partners.
Number of Counties completed water source inventory.
Growth of database, cleaning and import of data records.
